item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi; my name is Esteban Torres and I’m an Engineering Manager @ Spotify in Berlin & currently working on Backstage. I’m originally from ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡·Costa Rica where I started as an Engineer and quickly jumped on the iOS badwagon; this led me to land a job as an iOS @ SoundCloud which of course led to me & my family moving to ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª.
